title: Hereâ€™s Why Footwork in Badminton is Vital to Your Success.
content:
Badminton is a fun sport that keeps people on their feet. One of the factors players should keep track of is their footwork.

Commonly deemed as underrated, footwork is one of the key factors that guarantees a win for badminton players. Footwork allows players to get to the shuttlecock in the shortest and fastest route. Not only does good footwork enables players to play with confidence and recover quickly, it also encourages variation.
